entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Fort Albany
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:35 p.m. EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
